commentary: Bresnan to Ramdin, OUT bowled him, Bresnan squeezes the yorker past Ramdin! Leg stump is out of the ground, Ramdin is flat on the metaphorical canvas, England have won! Bresnan is engulfed by his team-mates, he held his nerve after being taken for three consecutive boundaries... As heartbeats begin to return to normal, England have won by 25 runs and take the series 2-1
